round knitting the two legs of each ds together when you come to them the stitch count will not change repeat rounds 1 and 2 of the yoke instructions to make a chain knit 3 rounds repeat rounds 1 and 2 of yoke next round *k1 p1 repeat from * across all sts repeat last round till ribbing measures 1 or 2 5 cm then bind off loosely in rib pattern note i did not change to a smaller needle for the ribbed section of the body sleeves return 58 60 66 70 held sts to main needle size you can choose between a long wire for magic looping a small wire for knitting in the round or dpns starting at the centre of the underarm pick up and knit 6 6 7 8 of the cast on sts then pick up 1 or 2 extra sts in the corner to help avoid gaps knit the sleeve sts on the needle pick up and knit 1 or 2 extra sts at the second corner gap of the underarm then pick up and knit remaining 6 6 7 8 cast on sts place a marker for the beginning of the round you will have 70 72 80 86 sts the sleeves are knit in the round with no decreases till the cuff however for the first round or two you will need to remove the extra stitches picked up in the gap area use a k2tog at the first gap and an ssk at the second gap and repeat again in the next round if you have picked up 2 extra sts knit even till work measures 12 30 cm or 11/2 4 cm less than desired length repeat rounds 1 and 2 of the yoke instructions to make a
